segments.text: I'm just standing here, watching this bizarre scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water! It's absolutely gushing over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a steady sheet flowing down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the growing puddle, yet she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are staging a covert cookie operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is precariously balanced on a stool that looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, the other holding a plate like a shield.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, the little girl, is eagerly reaching out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a perfectly choreographed domestic disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside just makes the whole thing even more surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe my eyes sometimes.
segments.speaker: PAR
